Body Lab Treatments

Body Lab is a medical spa located in the heart of Seminyak, Bali. We offer a variety of beauty and skincare treatments customised to your needs. Our highly trained therapists provide only the safest procedures using the latest beauty  technologies.

Face Lifting Body Sculpting Injectable Rejuvenation

Face Lifting Treatments

Specialising in Anti-Aging, Body Lab understands that unique characteristics in each individuals complex aging symptoms require a personalized solution. Hence, Body Lab offers comprehensive anti-aging and skin tightening solutions by specialists with profound experience combined with the most advanced medical devices to provide the optimal results.

Thermolift Facial

Rejuvenation Treatment

Thermolift is known as the most effective nonsurgical method for face rejuvenation. Using focused radio frequency to heat the skin at different levels, this treatment results in collagen build up. 

BENEFITS

  • Face contouring
  • Collagen and elastane production
  • Skin tightening and toning
  • Reduces the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles

LONG LASTING RESULTS

  • Clinically tested in extensive studies
  • Reduced treatment time 
  • Minimal recovery time

Muscle Stimulation

Facial

Muscle stimulation is one of the most effective ways to rejuvenate the skin. The process involves applying gentle electrical pulses and currents to the face. After your treatment you will feel more toned.

BENEFITS

  • Corrects and lifts the face contour
  • Smoothes wrinkles
  • Tones and re-contours 
  • Reduces puffiness

LONG LASTING RESULTS

  • Balances out the muscular system
  • Increases blood circulation
  • Alleviates muscle spasms

Microcurrent

Facial

Microcurrent facials are one of the latest innovations in the anti-aging industry, working the facial muscles to rebuild collagen in the dermis layer. By sending soft waves through the skin, micro-current stimulates facial muscles.

BENEFITS

  • Improves muscle tone in face and neck
  • Lifts jaws and eyebrows
  • Reduces the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles
  • Reduces puffiness
  • Stimulates lymphatic drainage

CLINICALLY PROVEN RESULTS

  • 85% of people surveyed noticed improvements in their facial contour
  • 80% reported their skin felt smoother
  • 77% said their face looked more toned

Radio Frequency

Fine Line Smoother

Radio frequency is a revolutionary treatment that strengthens, tightens and lifts the skin. RF stimulates the skin’s natural production of collagen  resulting in smoother, tighter and younger looking skin. Results are visible after the very first treatment and the whole process is quick and painless.

BENEFITS

  • Lifted, firmed and tightened skin
  • Produces collagen and elastin
  • Removes fine lines and wrinkles
  • Treats saggy skin and acne scarring
  • Relaxing and painless experience

LONG LASTING RESULTS

  • More youthful appearance
  • Firm plump and refreshed skin

Detox Facial

Comedo Extraction

Oxygeneo is a 3-in-1 super facial that deeply exfoliates, nourishes and oxygenates. Similar to microdermabrasion, this treatment removes dead cells, smoothes and renews the skin, preparing it to receive active nutrients with our exclusive serum.

CO2 bubbles gentling bursting on the skin create a physiological response, sending oxygen-rich blood to the area, increasing capillary flow and skin metabolism. See younger looking skin after your first treatment.

BENEFITS

  • Renewed youthful glow 
  •  Increased collagen
  • Reduced hyper-pigmentation
  • Improved skin cell production
  • Reduced appearance of wrinkles

Ultrasound Facial

Remove dead skin

Ultrasound facial uses ultrasonic waves and high-frequency vibrations to cleanse the skin. Removing dead skin cells and rejuvenating the epidermis, this gentle treatment can significantly reduce acne, clean clogged pores and smooth wrinkles.

Combination Facial

Ultrasound + Detox

The Combination Facial is our signature facial and combines our detox facial with our ultrasound peel / microdermabrasion facial. Perfect for refining skin texture, the Combination Facial includes deep facial cleaning, ultrasonic exfoliation or microdermabrasion, facial massage, blackhead extraction and pore cleansing. We finish off this indulgent treatment with a nourishing and calming alginate mask. Expect clearer, smoother skin from this indulgent facial.

BENEFITS:

  • Helps clear clogged pores, blackheads and pimples
  • Removes dead cells
  • Improves blood circulation and lymphatic drainage
  • Improves skin tone

LONG-LASTING RESULTS

  • Clean, toned and tightened skin
  • Diminished wrinkles and fine lines
  • Refreshing effect
  • Youthful appearance

Fruit Acid Peel

Shrink Pores and Fine Lines

Alpha Hydroxy Acid (AHA) facial peels can help you achieve a fresher, more luminous complexion. As old skin cells shed, new cells grow but when the old cells remain, your skin can look dull and lifeless. A weekly AHA peel will improve your skin texture immediately. The procedure is fast and convenient, taking only about fifteen minutes, with virtually no recovery time.

BENEFITS

  • Refines skin texture
  • Smooths fine lines
  • Reduces the appearance of acne scars 
  • Reduced pigmentation 

Oxygeneo

Oxygeneo is 3-in-1 super facial which is provide you professional exfoliation, nourishment and oxygenation. Similar to microdermabrasion, the Oxygeneo exfoliates the upper skin layer to remove dead cells, smooth and renew the skin, preparing it to receive active nutrients with our exclusive serum with fully nutrient-rich active ingredients. Oxygenation part is CO2 bubbles which gently burst on the skin surface creating a physiological response, sending oxygen-rich blood to the area, increasing capillary flow and skin metabolism. See younger looking skin after your first treatment.

Benefits:

  • Renewed youthful glow
  • Increased collagen
  • Reduced hyper-pigmentation
  • Improved skin cell production
  • Reduce the appearance of wrinkles

Body Tightening Treatments

We have the latest and highest quality imported machines to help you create the tight, toned body you've always dreamed of. Our experienced staff can help you figure out the right treatments for you and find a plan that will have you whipped into shape in no time with long lasting results.

Fat Freezing

Fat freezing is a non-invasive body contouring treatment used to reduce fat cell volume by freezing. The method involves the controlled application of cooling within the temperature range of +5 to -11 °C. The procedures use rounded paddles in one of four sizes to suction your skin and fat “like a vacuum,” fat cells that are frozen during the fat freezing treatment gradually die off and leave the body through the body’s natural elimination process. That’s why the results are long-term. One procedure can reduce 30% of volume treated area. Fat Freezing sessions can be done only once per month. 

Benefits:

  • Reduction of fat tissue
  • Body shaping and contouring
  • Skin tightening and toning
  • Cellulite reduction

Brazilian Butt

Brazilian Butt is our signature treatment combined with unique techniques muscle stimulation and vacuum roller massages on the buttocks area. Brazilian butt treatment can help to restore the volume, build the muscle and lift up your butt. The electrical impulses manage to “get” the gluteal muscle and work with it as if you were doing squats! And vacuum roller is great solution to fight cellulite and sagging skin.

Benefits:

  • build the muscle 
  • lift up the buttocks 
  • reduce cellulite
  • reduce sagging skin

3D Slimming

slimming + smoothing

Ultrasound cavitation uses high-frequency sound waves to disrupt the fat cell walls so that they “leak” their contents into the fluid spaces of your body. From there, your lymphatic system picks up this waste material (the loose fat) and begins circulating it through your body until it can be processed by liver and flushed from your body. The results are visibly noticeable immediately but full elimination of the toxins takes about seven days. We advise to do this treatment once a week.

The 3D slimming machine uses unique ultrasound cavitation technology combined with vacuum roller infrared function to break down fat and smooth the skin.

BENEFITS

  • Fat blasting
  • Body shaping and contouring
  • Skin tightening and toning
  • Cellulite reduction

LONG LASTING RESULTS

  • Stimulates lymphatic drainage
  • Boosts metabolism

Lifted Arms

Lifted arms treatment is body labs another signature combination of thermolift skin tightening treatment and vacuum roller massage. Thermolift will help to tighten flabby skin on the upper arms area and the vacuum -roller fight exes fat tissue. The procedure can be done 1-2 times a week, for the best result we recommend repeat 5-7 sessions.

Benefits:

  • slim arms

Pressotherapy

Detoxify and tone

Pressotherapy detox body wrap is an exclusive detoxifying treatment, which through effective lymphatic drainage, helps to promote the body's natural toxin clearing. Pressotherapy is used in conjunction with hot infrared wraps with a temperature of up to 60 degrees to detoxify, firm, tone, improve circulation and increase lymphatic drainage.

Benefits:

  • Slimming and detoxifying
  • Body shaping and profiling
  • Relieves pain and swelling, and provides immediate comfort
  • Redefines the legs, stomach and arms skin tone 

Laser Hair Removal

Permanent Hair Removal

Laser hair removal will give you smoother skin and permanent hair reduction. The light from the laser will destroy hair follicles in a matter of minutes. You'll save time, money, and you'll save yourself from a lifetime of shaving. Treatment can work on any body part you wish to remove hair from, it is especially effective on the bikini, lip, chin, and underarm area. To get the permanent effect of hair reduction you need to complete 7-10 sessions spaced 6-8 weeks apart. Each session will make your hairs thinner and thinner.

We ask that you shave the area you are treating beforehand so that the laser can penetrate into the root of the hair 

You should not wax, tweeze, or bleach any hair one month before your session because the root needs to stay intact in order for the laser to effectively destroy the hair.

Injectible Rejuvenation Treatments

Injectible treatments like botox and fillers are in high demand, but these are delicate proceedures that should only be performed by experienced medical staff. Body Lab not only has some of the highest trained staff of any medical spa in Bali with years of experience but also uses only premium quality imported products for all of their injectable treatments.

Botox

Injectable Rejuvenation

Botox blocks nerve activity in the muscles, causing a temporary reduction in muscle activity. Body Lab uses only the highest quality Allergan Botox from USA .

Botox injections work by weakening or paralyzing certain muscles or by blocking certain nerves. The effects last about three to 8 months, depending on what you are treating.

Where can we use the Botox to look younger?

  • Forehead between the eyes, frown lines.
  • Droopy eyebrows 
  • Crows feet 
  • Smokers line on the upper lip 
  • Horizontal age lines on the neck 

Botox can also be used to treat excessive underarm sweating.

Dermal Fillers

Injectables

Dermal fillers are gel-like substances that are injected beneath the skin to help to diminish facial lines and restore volume and fullness in the face. Depending on the type of filler, the effects can last anywhere from six months to two years.

The common issues dermal filler can help with :

  • Smooth out lines around nose and mouth (marionette lines, parentheses and smile lines )
  • Plumping the thin lips and smoothing out vertical lines around the edges .
  • Augmenting cheeks to enhance their shape, restoring youthful fullness.
  • Filling out depressions (hollows) under the eye area.
  • Smooth out a chin crease.

Body Lab uses only the leading world brands of dermal fillers including Juvederm Voluma, Juvederm Volift, Belotero Intense, Belotero Balance and many more.

Skin Boosters

Hydrate and plump

Skin Boosters are micro-injections of very smooth dermal filler in the skin which contains hyaluronic acid. This hyaluronic acid is soft and absorbs water and brings deep skin hydration to the treated areas, giving it improved firmness, elasticity, and smoothness. It is designed to restore hydration in the skin, resulting in long-lasting improvement in the skin quality. Pores and scars become more refined and skin tone improves significantly. Generally, Skin booster typically lasts for about 6 months. 

Benefits:

Refresh and improve the condition of your skin for a radiant and hydrated skin

  • Skin shine and elasticity
  • Acne scarring
  • Skin texture quality and turgidity
  • Fine wrinkles on the cheeks and face
